name: 20,000 Light Years Into Space
description: A Steampunk-themed strategy game where you have to manage a steam supply network on a distant planet.

name: A/B Street
description: Transportation planning and traffic simulation software for creating cities friendlier to walking, biking, and public transit.

name: Abuse
description: Side-scroller action game that pits you against ruthless alien killers.

name: ADOM
description: Ancient Domains Of Mystery.

name: Ancient Beast
description: Turn Based Strategy Game. Master your beasts!

name: Antichamber
description: A mind-bending psychological exploration game where nothing can be taken for granted.

name: Aquaria

name: Arx Libertatis
description: This project is a fully working, open source port of Arx Fatalis, a 2002 first-person role-playing game developed by Arkane Studios. It features some improvements over the original engine like bug fixes and wide screen support.

description: Sidescrolling game with ANSI text graphics in which you are a person holding a device which creates portals, or links to other parts of the level.

name: Ashes 2063

name: Atanks

name: Beyond All Reason

name: Bomberclone
description: Free Bomberman-like game for Linux and Windows. The rules of the game are simple: run though a level and bomb other players.

name: Brogue

name: Broken Sword 2.5: The Return of the Templars
description: Fan-made sequel in the point-and-click adventure series Broken Sword.

name: Cave Story/Doukutsu
